meanings.definition: The process of chemical and physical changes undergone by sediments during their consolidation into rock.
meanings.sent1: The diageneses of the sediments turned them into solid rock over time.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the diageneses of sediments to understand how rocks form.
meanings.sent3: The diageneses of the sediments seemed like a magical transformation from soft to hard.
meanings.sent4: The diageneses of the sediments were like a slow dance of elements coming together.
meanings.sent5: The diageneses of the sediments were as gradual as the changing colors of a sunset.

meanings.definition: The collective changes undergone by sediments during their transformation into rock.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the diageneses of the sediments resulted in the formation of solid rock.
meanings.sent2: The diageneses of sediments can take millions of years to complete.
meanings.sent3: The diageneses of the sediments were like a group of friends transforming into a rock band.
meanings.sent4: The diageneses of the sediments were a symphony of changes harmonizing into rock formation.
meanings.sent5: The diageneses of the sediments were as inevitable as the changing seasons.
